languages.text: {n}Холодное прикосновение когтистой перчатки застает врасплох: взяв вас за подбородок, Маражай наклоняется вперед — так близко, что вы видите узкую полоску темной бирюзы вокруг расширенных зрачков друкари.{/n} "Я могу показать тебе этот мир, {name}. Я могу научить тебя. Если ты будешь слушаться".

{n}The cold touch of the clawed glove takes you by surprise — grasping your chin, Marazhai leans forward, so close that you can see the narrow band of dark turquoise around the Drukhari's dilated pupils.{/n} "I can show you that world, {name}. I can teach you. If you do as you are told."
languages.original_text: {n}Холодное прикосновение когтистой перчатки застает врасплох: взяв вас за подбородок, Маражай наклоняется вперед — так близко, что вы видите узкую полоску темной бирюзы вокруг расширенных зрачков друкари.{/n} "Я могу показать тебе этот мир, {name}. Я могу научить тебя. Если ты будешь слушаться".

traits.locale_text: {n}The cold touch of the clawed glove takes you by surprise — grasping your chin, Marazhai leans forward, so close that you can see the narrow band of dark turquoise around the Drukhari's dilated pupils.{/n} "I can show you that world, {name}. I can teach you. If you do as you are told."
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: {n}玛拉斋突然捏住了你的下巴，带爪手套的冰冷触感令你大吃一惊。他身体前倾，和你靠得很近，你甚至能看到他放大的瞳孔四周有一圈狭长的绿松石色。{/n}“我愿意让你亲眼看到那个世界，{name}。我可以教你，只要你肯听话。”
languages.original_text: {n}The cold touch of the clawed glove takes you by surprise — grasping your chin, Marazhai leans forward, so close that you can see the narrow band of dark turquoise around the Drukhari's dilated pupils.{/n} "I can show you that world, {name}. I can teach you. If you do as you are told."

traits.locale_text: {n}玛拉斋突然捏住了你的下巴，带爪手套的冰冷触感令你大吃一惊。他身体前倾，和你靠得很近，你甚至能看到他放大的瞳孔四周有一圈狭长的绿松石色。{/n}“我愿意让你亲眼看到那个世界，{name}。我可以教你，只要你肯听话。”
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: {n}爪のついた籠手の冷たさに驚きを覚える。マラズハイはあなたの顎をつかむと、こちらに顔を寄せてきた。至近距離ではデュカーリ特有の拡い瞳孔の周りに濃いターコイズ色の細かい筋が見える。{/n}「俺ならその世界を見せてやれるぞ、{name}。教えてやろう。お前が言われた通りに出来たならな」
languages.original_text: {n}The cold touch of the clawed glove takes you by surprise — grasping your chin, Marazhai leans forward, so close that you can see the narrow band of dark turquoise around the Drukhari's dilated pupils.{/n} "I can show you that world, {name}. I can teach you. If you do as you are told."

traits.locale_text: {n}爪のついた籠手の冷たさに驚きを覚える。マラズハイはあなたの顎をつかむと、こちらに顔を寄せてきた。至近距離ではデュカーリ特有の拡い瞳孔の周りに濃いターコイズ色の細かい筋が見える。{/n}「俺ならその世界を見せてやれるぞ、{name}。教えてやろう。お前が言われた通りに出来たならな」
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: {n}El frío tacto del guantelete con garras te coge por sorpresa. Marazhai te agarra de la barbilla y se inclina hacia ti, tan cerca que puedes ver el estrecho aro de color turquesa oscuro que rodea las pupilas dilatadas del drukhari.{/n} «Yo puedo mostrarte ese mundo, {name}. Puedo enseñarte. Si haces lo que te diga».
languages.original_text: {n}The cold touch of the clawed glove takes you by surprise — grasping your chin, Marazhai leans forward, so close that you can see the narrow band of dark turquoise around the Drukhari's dilated pupils.{/n} "I can show you that world, {name}. I can teach you. If you do as you are told."

traits.locale_text: {n}El frío tacto del guantelete con garras te coge por sorpresa. Marazhai te agarra de la barbilla y se inclina hacia ti, tan cerca que puedes ver el estrecho aro de color turquesa oscuro que rodea las pupilas dilatadas del drukhari.{/n} «Yo puedo mostrarte ese mundo, {name}. Puedo enseñarte. Si haces lo que te diga».
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: {n}Le contact glacial du gant hérissé de griffes vous prend au dépourvu lorsque le Drukhari vous saisit le menton avant de se pencher vers vous, si près que vous apercevez la fine bande bleu sombre qui entoure ses pupilles dilatées.{/n} « Ce monde, je peux vous le montrer, {name}. Je suis prêt à vous apprendre... à condition que vous suiviez mes instructions à la lettre. »
languages.original_text: {n}The cold touch of the clawed glove takes you by surprise — grasping your chin, Marazhai leans forward, so close that you can see the narrow band of dark turquoise around the Drukhari's dilated pupils.{/n} "I can show you that world, {name}. I can teach you. If you do as you are told."

traits.locale_text: {n}Le contact glacial du gant hérissé de griffes vous prend au dépourvu lorsque le Drukhari vous saisit le menton avant de se pencher vers vous, si près que vous apercevez la fine bande bleu sombre qui entoure ses pupilles dilatées.{/n} « Ce monde, je peux vous le montrer, {name}. Je suis prêt à vous apprendre... à condition que vous suiviez mes instructions à la lettre. »
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: {n}Du wirst überrascht von der kalten Berührung des Klauenhandschuhs – Marazhai greift nach deinem Kinn und beugt sich vor. Er nähert sich dir dabei so sehr, dass du die schmalen dunkeltürkisfarbenen Streifen um die geweiteten Pupillen des Drukhari erblickst.{/n} "Ich kann Euch diese Welt zeigen, {name}. Ich kann sie Euch lehren. Wenn Ihr tut, was ich von Euch verlange."
languages.original_text: {n}The cold touch of the clawed glove takes you by surprise — grasping your chin, Marazhai leans forward, so close that you can see the narrow band of dark turquoise around the Drukhari's dilated pupils.{/n} "I can show you that world, {name}. I can teach you. If you do as you are told."

Er nähert sich dir dabei so sehr, dass du die schmalen dunkeltürkisfarbenen Streifen um die geweiteten Pupillen des Drukhari erblickst.{/n} "Ich kann Euch diese Welt zeigen, {name}. Ich kann sie Euch lehren. Wenn Ihr tut, was ich von Euch verlange."
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.original_text: {n}The cold touch of the clawed glove takes you by surprise — grasping your chin, Marazhai leans forward, so close that you can see the narrow band of dark turquoise around the Drukhari's dilated pupils.{/n} "I can show you that world, . I can teach you. If you do as you are told."

languages.text: {n}Pençeli eldivenin soğuk dokunuşu seni gafil avlıyor. Çeneni sıkıca kavrayan Marazhai, öne doğru eğiliyor. Sana o kadar yaklaşıyor ki Drukhari'nin büyüyen göz bebeklerinin etrafını sarmış, koyu turkuaz rengi, ince şeridi görebiliyorsun.{/n} "Sana bu dünyayı gösterebilirim {name}. Sana öğretebilirim. Söylenenleri yaparsan tabii ki..."
languages.original_text: {n}The cold touch of the clawed glove takes you by surprise — grasping your chin, Marazhai leans forward, so close that you can see the narrow band of dark turquoise around the Drukhari's dilated pupils.{/n} "I can show you that world, {name}. I can teach you. If you do as you are told."

traits.locale_text: {n}Pençeli eldivenin soğuk dokunuşu seni gafil avlıyor. Çeneni sıkıca kavrayan Marazhai, öne doğru eğiliyor. Sana o kadar yaklaşıyor ki Drukhari'nin büyüyen göz bebeklerinin etrafını sarmış koyu turkuaz rengi ince şeridi görebiliyorsun.{/n} "Sana bu dünyayı gösterebilirim {name}. Sana öğretebilirim.
